DataElement.preferredName: Hearing Devices Use During Physician Visit Yes No Special Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether or not a patient has worn his/her hearing aid device (or hearing aid devices) for his/her visit to the physician.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hearing Devices Use During Physician Visit
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Devices that are used to enhance hearing._To put into action or service._At some point in a given period of time._A doctor; a person who has been educated, trained, and licensed to practice the art and science of medicine; a practitioner of medicine, as contrasted with a surgeon._The act of going to see some person or place or thing; it can cover a short or long period but refers to a non-permanent arrangement.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Devices that are used to enhance hearing.

Concepts.definition: Devices that are used to enhance hearing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.
